name: BMM_LITERAL_VALUE
documentation: Meta-type for literal instance values declared in a model. Instance values may be inline values of primitive types in the usual fashion or complex objects in syntax form, e.g. JSON.

value_literal.name: value_literal
value_literal.documentation: A serial representation of the value.

value.name: value
value.documentation: A native representation of the value, possibly derived by deserialising `_value_literal_`.

syntax.name: syntax
syntax.documentation: Optional specification of formalism of the `_value_literal_` attribute for complex values. Value may be any of `json | json5 | yawl | xml | odin | rdf` or another value agreed by the user community. If not set, `json` is assumed.
